name.str: Hologram Projector - Locator of Scientist Compound

description: This is a hologram projector which generates an interactive hologram when you activate it. Hologram can talk to you, answer some of your questions, but most importantly, it can locate Scientist Compound

use_action.summon_msg: Hologram appears in front of you!

name.str: Hologram Projector - Locator of Shady Warehouse

description: This is a hologram projector which generates an interactive hologram when you activate it. Hologram can talk to you, answer some of your questions, but most importantly, it can locate Shady Warehouse

use_action.summon_msg: Hologram appears in front of you!
